page.title: 09RELIGION IN THE BUSBY AREA
page.content: The religious denominations which have churches in the area are{The Church of {Scotland,the Baptist Church,The {Evangelical Church}and there is a {Roman Catholic}church just outside the area. Busby West Church recently celebrated its 150th anniversary and Greenbank its centenary.Both have a wide variety of organisations important to the social life of the community,such as } the Boys'Brigade,Girl Guides and clubs such as badminton. Greenbank Church has 1,830 members and Busby East and West have 763.In 1984, Greenbank had 50{christenings}to Busby's 25 and 25{weddings}to Busby's 6.While Church membership in Greenbank has increased there has been a decline in Busby where two congregations share one minister.The Sunday Schools for children are well attended in both.
